titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the alternative fuels credit for liquified petroleum gas through 2010.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the alternative fuels credit for liquified petroleum gas through 2010.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2010 the excise tax credit for alternative fuels and fuel mixtures for any sale or use involving liquified petroleum gas.
